import { useState } from "react" function Form({transactions,setTransactions}){ const [formEntry,enterFormData]=useState({ date:"", description:"", category:"", amount:"" }) return( <>
) function Submit(event){ event.preventdefault() enterFormData([...transactions,formEntry]) transactions.push=[...transactions] } function Change(e){ const{name,value}=e.target enterFormData(init) } } export default Form
